entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as walking away without a word to someone, and later he has a clear view of the bodies lying next to Fred. He also reeled backward from the doorway.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as joining Bill, Fleur, and Percy, and an arm was flung around his shoulders.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as approaching Ginny, hugging her, and moving closer to the rest of the family.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as having a swollen and blotchy face, and was hugged by Hermione.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred's body is lying next to the bodies of Remus and Tonks.

entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is described as pale and still, apparently asleep beneath the dark, enchanted ceiling.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as pale and still, apparently asleep beneath the dark, enchanted ceiling.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is part of a group that Ron joined.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is part of a group that Ron joined.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is part of a group that Ron joined.

relationships.description: Ron joined Bill, Fleur, and Percy.
Harry had a clear view of the bodies lying next to Fred.
